event.title: Lean Coffee
event.description:
Come and join us for an evening of lively discussions about Scrum, agile and whatever else you fancy.

We'll be using the Lean Coffee format which is a structured, but agenda-less, meeting that ensures discussions are relevant and productive; by having the topics democratically generated by the participants.

We will be in the function room of the Llandoger Trow in Bristol city centre which is a 15 min walk from Temple Meads Station.

Nearby car parks are the Queen Charlotte Street Car Park & the NCP on Prince Street.

Refreshments for the evening have been kindly sponsored by our friends at Agile Bear (the only place to go for awesome agile consulting & coaching!)
